items.name: Premium Bluetooth Headphones
items.description: Experience crystal-clear sound and remarkable noise cancellation with our premium headphones. Perfect for music lovers and professionals alike.

items.name: Wireless Ergonomic Keyboard
items.description: Type in comfort with our ergonomic keyboard, designed to reduce strain and increase productivity.

items.name: Lightweight Running Shoes
items.description: Ultra-lightweight and breathable running shoes that provide exceptional comfort and support for your daily runs.

items.name: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
items.description: Made from 100% organic cotton, this t-shirt is both eco-friendly and comfortable for everyday wear.

items.name: Smart Home Hub
items.description: Control your entire smart home ecosystem from one central hub. Compatible with all major smart home devices.

items.name: Ceramic Pour-Over Coffee Maker
items.description: Brew the perfect cup of coffee with this elegant ceramic pour-over. Simple design for maximum flavor extraction.

items.name: Modern Desk Lamp
items.description: This adjustable desk lamp provides perfect lighting for working or reading, with multiple brightness levels.

items.name: Classic Novel Collection
items.description: A curated collection of ten classic novels with beautiful hardbound covers. Perfect for collectors and literature enthusiasts.

items.name: Wireless Earbuds
items.description: Truly wireless earbuds with exceptional sound quality and 24-hour battery life with the charging case.

items.name: Minimalist Watch
items.description: A sleek, minimalist watch with a clean dial and premium leather band. Water-resistant and built to last.

items.name: Yoga Mat
items.description: Professional-grade yoga mat with excellent grip and cushioning. Eco-friendly and free from harmful chemicals.

items.name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
items.description: Double-walled insulated water bottle that keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours.
